backend/DirectionType.mo: Defines a DirectionType variant with up and down values.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing market data, snapshots, user preferences, and asset filtering with caching logic.
backend/MarketData.mo: Defines MarketData containing symbol, price, volume, and direction.
backend/Theme.mo: Defines a Theme variant with darkNeon and cyberGlow options.
backend/UserPreferences.mo: Defines user preferences including favourites, theme, alerts, language, and input type with principal.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: PWA‑optimized HTML entry with icons, splash screens, meta tags, and iOS standalone support.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, screenshots, shortcuts, and theme settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker v9 handling caching, activation cleanup, and strict fetch rules for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing tabs, service worker updates, URL sync, online status, and initializing the learning engine.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformancePan: Displays AI learning statistics for an asset or top assets, loading data from the learning engine with compact and full modes.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors, shows diagnostic UI, and clears caches before reloading the app.
frontend/src/components/AssetResearch.ts: Asset search and analysis panel fetching Binance data, supporting autocomplete, symbol selection, and predictive insights.
frontend/src/components/DataStatusIndica: Shows real‑time data status including stale data, errors, provider info, and retry option.
frontend/src/components/DynamicAlerts.ts: Generates and displays real‑time radar and recommendation alerts with cooldown logic, sensitivity rules, and auto‑dismiss.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with a copyright message, heart icon, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding and a conditional PWA install button and dialog.
frontend/src/components/ICPAnalysis.tsx: Shows detailed ICP market analysis with loading, error handling, and dynamic styling based on price movement.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Provides a timed install prompt for the PWA with platform‑specific messaging and a dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/MarketCard.tsx: Displays a selectable market summary card with price, volume, trend, and confidence indicators.
frontend/src/components/MarketOverview.t: Lists all markets with selectable cards and shows detailed analysis for the selected symbol, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/MarketSnapshotDi: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Opportunities.ts: Displays categorized trading opportunities with loading, error states, freshness info, and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/PredictiveConfid: Displays predictive confidence metrics using gradients, badges, and compact or detailed layouts based on provided analysis data.
frontend/src/components/PWADiagnosticsVi: UI component that displays PWA diagnostic info such as display mode, install prompt status, and readiness, with refresh support.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Installation dialog that guides users through PWA installation steps, with special handling for iOS devices.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallStatus: Shows current PWA installation status, installability, device support, and provides install actions when available.
frontend/src/components/RadarDashboard.t: Main radar dashboard handling market data, anomaly alerts, filters, learning signals, and new alert detection with extensive UI controls.
frontend/src/components/ResetFromScratch: Confirmation dialog that resets all local app data and reloads the app, showing status and handling errors.
frontend/src/components/TabFetchErrorSta: Displays a styled error state with optional error details and reload handling, including special messaging for interface mismatch issues.
frontend/src/components/TabPageCard.tsx: Renders a themed card layout for tab pages with optional icon, badge, and content slot.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides theme context for switching between darkNeon and cyberGlow themes with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/TopRecommendatio: Fetches market and recommendation data, displaying loading, error, or a scrollable list of enriched top recommendations.
Manages user settings like theme, favorites, alerts, and learning priorities with UI controls and persistent storage.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/analysisEnric: Computes advanced technical analysis with confidence scoring, learning engine integration, and detection of zones and institutional orders.
Provides functions to fetch Binance market data and specific assets with error handling plus a filter for major trading pairs.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/binanceFuture: Provides funding rate and open interest fetchers for Binance Futures with partial-failure handling and in‑memory history tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/learningInteg: Integrates market data with a learning engine to record and update prediction results, optionally prioritizing favourite symbols.
Generates recommendations and detects anomalies like volatility, funding irregularities, and volume spikes using market data and futures metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/opportunityRu: Selects scalping and swing trading opportunities by scoring market data on volume, volatility, momentum, and confidence.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/unifiedSnapsh: Transforms backend UnifiedSnapshot into frontend BinanceMarketData and enriches it with technical analysis while validating fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Fetches Binance market data and computes categorized trading opportunities using predefined selection rules.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWADiagnostics.ts: Runs client-side checks for PWA readiness, including display mode, install prompt, service worker, manifest, and icon availability.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Manages PWA installability state, install prompt handling, display mode detection, and installation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching Binance market data, enriching it with technical analysis, and integrating learning and alert systems.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarSensitivity.t: Stores and updates radar sensitivity presets with localStorage syncing across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates and exposes a method to trigger skip-waiting and reload.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, root CSS variables, theme variants, and background effects for dark neon and cyber glow modes.
frontend/src/lib/learningEngine.ts: Implements an IndexedDB‑backed learning engine for storing predictions, computing stats, and managing adaptive model config.
frontend/src/lib/radarFilters.ts: Provides radar filter defaults, persistence in localStorage, and utilities for loading, saving, and resetting anomaly-type filters.
frontend/src/lib/radarSensitivity.ts: Defines radar sensitivity presets with thresholds and persistence, and exposes helpers to get and apply the active policy.
frontend/src/lib/resetFromScratch.ts: Orchestrates full client-side reset by clearing IndexedDB, caches, service workers, and localStorage with a success flag.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context, and loads global CSS.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors tied to CSS variables, and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, features, and planned improvements focused on Radar anomaly detection.
